examples.hypothesis: amapholisa wekhethu la adla nge khulu
tjhumi amabili eli kwe minyaka elithoba
ngihlala e n e zal esiyaliemawini
masumi amane weminyaka a neminyaka elithoba
mhlana amalanga alikhomba kuskhu ku khukhulamungu
nangabe uskhosana akamazi kuh uzazi le
zaziphela zoke kanye nesele la khona

notes.Substitution note: These are character level substitutions which are used to approximate phoneme confusion.
notes.Morphological analysis note: Morphological errors include stem mismatches and prefix/suffix mismatches.
